original_text: They that were full have hired out themselves for bread; and they that were hungry ceased: so that the barren hath born seven; and she that hath many children is waxed feeble.
korean_text: 풍족하던 자들은 양식을 위하여 품을 팔고 주리던 자들은 다시 주리지 아니하도다 전에 임신하지 못하던 자는 일곱을 낳았고 많은 자녀를 둔 자는 쇠약하도다

sentences.original_text: They that were full have hired out themselves for bread
sentences.korean_translation: 배부른 자들은 빵을 얻기 위해 자신을 고용하였다

sentences.original_text: and they that were hungry ceased
so that the barren hath born seven
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 임신하지 못하던 자가 일곱 아이를 낳았다

sentences.original_text: and she that hath many children is waxed feeble
